item.title: China’s game-changing taxi-hailing app
item.dc:creator: CY Xu
item.description: A brand new app is driving change by redistributing taxi resources in Beijing. CNN’s Kristie Lu Stout reports. Producer: Yuli Yang Cameraman: CY Xu Nov 2014 For CNN
item.content:encoded:
A brand new app is driving change by redistributing taxi resources in Beijing. CNN’s Kristie Lu Stout reports.

Producer: Yuli Yang
Cameraman: CY Xu

Nov 2014
For CNN

item.title: Investors want in on China’s tech scene
item.dc:creator: CY Xu
item.description: Hip, young and constantly fascinated by new apps and gadgets. China’s internet and tech scene is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing. Investors are desperately digging for the next big thing. A 26-year-old entrepreneur has created a platform to connect the dots. CNN link: edition.cnn.com/video/data/2.0/video/business/2014/11/11/spc-smart-business-china-next-big-thing.cnn.html Producer: Yuli Yang Cameraman: CY Xu Camera: Canon […]
item.content:encoded:
Hip, young and constantly fascinated by new apps and gadgets. China’s internet and tech scene is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing. Investors are desperately digging for the next big thing. A 26-year-old entrepreneur has created a platform to connect the dots.

CNN link: edition.cnn.com/video/data/2.0/video/business/2014/11/11/spc-smart-business-china-next-big-thing.cnn.html

Producer: Yuli Yang
Cameraman: CY Xu
Camera: Canon C300 + Nikon D800

Nov 2014
For CNN

item.title: Business Traveller: Rail rules in Asia
item.dc:creator: CY Xu
item.description: CNN Business Traveller looks at what makes China the king of high speed rail, while India lacks modern infrastructure. Producer: Steven Jiang Cameraman: CY Xu (China part) Apr 2013 For CNN
